data.content:
noun
plural -tions
the act or process of holding a trial against a person who is accused of a crime to see if that person is guilty [count]
There has been an increase in prosecutions for gun-related crimes. [noncount]
The defendant is awaiting prosecution.
the prosecution :the side of a legal case which argues that a person who is accused of a crime is guilty :the lawyer or lawyers who prosecute someone in a court case
The prosecution called their first witness.
The prosecution rests, Your Honor.
The defense told the jury that the prosecution had not proved its case. - often used before another noun
prosecution attorneys/lawyers - compare defense
[noncount] formal :the act of doing or continuing to do something - usually + of
the prosecution of the war

Danh từ
sự tuy tố; vụ truy tố
there have been several prosecutions for drug smuggling recently
gần đây đã có nhiều vụ truy tố về buôn lậu ma túy
bên truy tố
sự tiếp tục; sự theo đuổi
in the prosecution of his duties, he had met with a good deal of resistance
trong khi tiếp tục nhiệm vụ, nó đã gặp phải rất nhiều sự chống cự
